name: Sphere Rays Technolabs Pvt. Ltd.
description: Zaple, developed by Sphere Rays, is a comprehensive WhatsApp Business API solution designed to enhance customer engagement and streamline communication. With over 17 years of experience in software development, Sphere Rays has tailored Zaple to meet the unique needs of enterprises, SMBs, and growing businesses worldwide. Zaple empowers businesses with message broadcasting, notification automation, and robust customer support capabilities. Tailored for service providers, media agencies, resellers, and tech enablers, Zaple offers features like multi-agent access, AI-driven auto-replies, and customizable live chat solutions, enabling businesses to effectively manage their operations on WhatsApp. Our commitment to excellence ensures that businesses can maximize engagement, leverage automation, and drive marketing success through the power of WhatsApp.
focus_areas: Omnichannel Messaging Team Collaborative Inbox, chat commerce , payment through WhatsApp, Messenger, IG, WeChat, Web Plugin
CRM, WhatsApp Bots, Automations, Integrations with 100+ Apps.
